channel.title: Crash in Test Chamber
channel.description:
Every time I am in the test chamber, after I put the sample into the machine, it will go on as usual, but suddenly like clockwork the game will stop working. I have the crash log, and yes I did check to see if the files were corrupt, and they aren't all MD5 sums match every single file.
[code]Problem signature: Problem Event Name:APPCRASH Application Name:hl2.exe Application Version:0.0.0.0 Application Timestamp:470c11ae Fault Module Name:client.dll Fault Module Version:0.0.0.0 Fault Module Timestamp:504ecc4f Exception Code:c0000005 Exception Offset:00362edd OS Version:6.1.7601.2.1.0.256.48 Locale ID:1033 Additional Information 1:0a9e Additional Information 2:0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789 Additional Information 3:0a9e Additional Information 4:0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789
Read our privacy statement online: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=104288&clcid=0x0409
If the online privacy statement is not available, please read our privacy statement offline: C:\Windows\system32\en-US\erofflps.txt [/code]
Machine: [code] Windows 7 Professional Intel i5 Ivy Core 4.2Ghz Quad Core Nvidia 550Ti 1000Mhz 16GB RAM [/code]
If any other information is needed, please just ask.

Every time I am in the test chamber, after I put the sample into the machine, it will go on as usual, but suddenly like clockwork the game will stop working.
I have the crash log, and yes I did check to see if the files were corrupt, and they arenâ€™t all MD5 sums match every single file.
